name: Aquaman VFX
description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

key_work.title: Aquaman
key_work.creator_credit: Charles Roven, Deborah Snyder, Peter Safran, Rob Cowan, Zack Snyder, Panoramic Pictures, DC Films and Cruel & Unusual Films
key_work.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 2018
key_work.brief_description: Once home to the most advanced civilization on Earth, Atlantis is now an underwater kingdom ruled by the power-hungry King Orm. With a vast army at his disposal, Orm plans to conquer the remaining oceanic people and then the surface world. Standing in his way is Arthur Curry, Orm’s half-human, half-Atlantean brother and true heir to the throne.

constellations_primary.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_primary.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

constellations_other.name: Australians on the world stage
constellations_other.description: George Miller’s Mad Max revolutionised movies when it tore through cinemas in 1979. Max Rockatansky’s journey dispensing justice across the wasteland in his V8 Interceptor became a cult classic and catapulted Australian cinema onto the world stage.

start.title: Selena
start.brief_description: In this biographical drama, Selena Quintanilla is born into a musical Mexican-American family in Texas. Her father, Abraham, realizes that his young daughter is talented and begins performing with her at small venues. She finds success and falls for her guitarist, Chris Perez, who draws the ire of her father. Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

end.title: Hustlers
end.creator_credit: Chelsea Barnard, Jessica Elbaum, Benny Medina, Elaine Goldsmith-Thomas, Jennifer Lopez, Will Ferrell, Gloria Sanchez, Adam McKay, Lorene Scafaria, Jessica Pressler and Nuyorican Productions
end.brief_description: A crew of savvy former strip club employees band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

constellations_other.name: Ladies who own the narrative
constellations_other.description: Despite the lag in making it in mainstream cinema, female action heroes can actually be traced back to the late 19th century in early magic lantern performances of Jane Conquest, who saved both her child and a ship full of men.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

constellations_other.name: Crime doesn't pay
constellations_other.description: Ned Kelly's famous armour has appeared in many films, but the criminal myth speaks to how audiences have always been captivated by true-crime stories, from the beginning of cinema to today.

constellations_other.name: Female villains, anti-heroes and scammers
constellations_other.description: Mrs. Appleyard (Natalie Dormer) Picnic at Hanging Rock (2018) conceals her dark past by creating a new identity for herself as the Headmistress of the renowned finishing school Appleyard College. Explore how Mrs. Appleyard fits into a cluster of famous female villains and anti-heroes on screen.

constellations_other.name: Breaking the binary
constellations_other.description: Tilda Swinton name has become synonymous with androgyny since she first appeared on our screens in the mid-1980s, leading a cultural shift towards today’s understanding of gender as fluid and ever-changing. Orlando was key to establishing her influence and allure.

links.description: Selena (1997) was the breakout movie for Jennifer Lopez, who received a Golden Globe nomination for her portrayal. Some 22 years later she starred in the critically acclaimed Hustlers (2019), directed and written by Lorene Scafaria.

start.title: Once Were Warriors
start.brief_description: A drama about a Maori family living in Auckland, New Zealand. Lee Tamahori tells the story of Beth Heke’s strong will to keep her family together during times of unemployment and abuse from her violent and alcoholic husband.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

end.title: Green Lantern
end.creator_credit: Geoff Johns, Greg Berlanti and Donald De Line
end.brief_description: For centuries, a small but powerful force of warriors called the Green Lantern Corps has sworn to keep intergalactic order. Each Green Lantern wears a ring that grants him superpowers. But when a new enemy called Parallax threatens to destroy the balance of power in the Universe, their fate and the fate of Earth lie in the hands of the first human ever recruited.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

links.description: Morrison’s performance in Once Were Warriors (1994) was so powerful that he became one of the most successful Māori actors ever. As well as critically acclaimed fare, he regularly appeared in sci-fi blockbusters like the Star Wars prequels (1999 - 2003) and Green Lantern (2011).

start.title: Green Lantern
start.creator_credit: Donald De Line, Greg Berlanti and Geoff Johns
start.brief_description: For centuries, a small but powerful force of warriors called the Green Lantern Corps has sworn to keep intergalactic order. Each Green Lantern wears a ring that grants him superpowers. But when a new enemy called Parallax threatens to destroy the balance of power in the Universe, their fate and the fate of Earth lie in the hands of the first human ever recruited.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

end.title: The Mandalorian
end.creator_credit: John Bartnicki, Lucasfilm Ltd., Golem Creations, Fairview Entertainment, Doug Chiang, Shawna Trpcic and Andrew L. Jones

video_links.name: The Mandalorian | Official Trailer | Disney+ | Streaming Nov. 12
The Mandalorian | Season 2 Official Trailer | Disney+
The Mandalorian | Official Trailer 2 | Disney+ | Streaming Nov. 12

end.brief_description: After the fall of the Galactic Empire, lawlessness has spread throughout the galaxy. A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches, earning his keep as a bounty hunter.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history

constellations_other.name: Action, emotion and videogames
constellations_other.description: More and more, videogames are beginning to favour emotion as much as action, just like their film and TV cousins.

constellations_other.name: Sound and cinema
constellations_other.description: Beginning with one of the first films to be screened at the Palais (a Melbourne cinema with its own outstanding resident orchestra) the constellation celebrates sound as an integral part of the connection between moving image work and audience.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

links.description: Considered a massive flop, Green Lantern (2011) featured two prominent Māori actors who both went on to work within the Star Wars universe: Morrison, of course, and Taika Waititi, who directed an episode of The Mandalorian (2019) and voiced the character of IG-11.

start.title: Aquaman
start.creator_credit: Charles Roven, Deborah Snyder, Peter Safran, Rob Cowan, Zack Snyder, Panoramic Pictures, DC Films and Cruel & Unusual Films

links.description: James Wan brought one of DC Comics most laughable characters to life with serious success in Aquaman (2018), starring Hawaiian actor Jason Momoa as the title character. Playing his father was Temuera Morrison, who was the breakout star of Once Were Warriors (1994).

start.title: La Cerca
start.brief_description: Edward James Olmos narrates this multi-fest winner about an immigrant who recalls a vivid and momentous memory where he discovered his boundaries.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

end.title: Battlestar Galactica
end.brief_description: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

links.description: The award-winning short La Cerca (2005) was written and directed by prominent Latino filmmaker SJ Main Muñoz and narrated by Edward James Olmos. An Oscar nominee and Golden Globe winner, Olmos is perhaps best known for his TV work including Battlestar Galactica (2004 - 2009).

end.title: Whip It
end.brief_description: In Bodeen, Texas, Land Of The Dragon, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

links.description: An award-winning screenwriter, director, and playwright, Hustlers (2019) filmmaker Lorene Scafaria was also briefly a singer/songwriter. Her track 28 appeared on the soundtrack for Drew Barrymore’s directorial debut, Whip It (2009), about an aspiring roller derby player.

links.description: Sure, The Mandalorian (2019) gave us Baby Yoda, but more importantly it also gave us Star Wars’ first female director in 42 years. Deborah Chow directed two episodes on the series and got her start working on short films like La Cerca (2005).

start.title: Battlestar Galactica
start.brief_description: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.

end.title: Selena
end.brief_description: In this biographical drama, Selena Quintanilla is born into a musical Mexican-American family in Texas. Her father, Abraham, realizes that his young daughter is talented and begins performing with her at small venues. She finds success and falls for her guitarist, Chris Perez, who draws the ire of her father. Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

links.description: Apart from playing Admiral William Adama in Battlestar Galactica (2004 - 2009), Olmos is credited with doing much to boost Latino representation on screen and behind the camera. He also appeared in Selena (1997), a biography of the Mexican American singer of the same name.
